title: sans serif with a distinctive capital Q, used on Claudia Quintet's recent albums
content:
Hi everyone,

I'm looking for this font, used by Karssonwilker, Inc. on John Hollenbeck's Claudia Quintet's most recent albums.  
The capital Q is very distinctive, as you can see here :

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060300im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jh1_0_5812.jpg)

I've been looking around quite a while but found nothing that matches

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060300im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jh10_0_3836.jpg)

Also apparently the numerals used in the tracklist are a monospace variation, as the "1" on the following image appears to miss the slant

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060300im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jh7_0_6015.jpg)

Thanks a lot folks!

Font: 

 Replica LL 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060300/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: Fruitor
